title: Universal Dive Certifications Schema
description: Defines the structure for representing scuba diving certifications across all agencies, including recreational, technical, cave, rescue, and professional levels.

version.description: Semantic version or date-based tag for this dataset (e.g., '2025.10').

generated_at.description: ISO timestamp when the dataset was last generated.

certifications.description: List of all certifications defined in this dataset.

id.description: Unique ID for this certification. Must start with 'cert-'. Example: 'cert-padi-ow'.

agency.description: The issuing agency. If the value starts with 'agency-', it's treated as a reference to an agency ID in the agencies dataset. Otherwise, it's used as the literal agency name. Example: 'agency-padi' or 'PADI'.

abbr.description: Common abbreviation used in the diving community (e.g., 'OW', 'AOW', 'RD', 'AN/DP').

succeeded_by.description: If this certification was replaced, the successor certification. If the value starts with 'cert-', it's treated as a reference to another certification ID in the dataset. Otherwise, it's used as the literal certification name.

historical_names.description: Previous or alternate names used historically for this certification.

prerequisites.description: Required prior certifications and general requirements.

certifications.description: List of required certifications. If a value starts with 'cert-', it's treated as a reference to another certification ID in the dataset. Otherwise, it's used as the literal certification name.

general.description: General prerequisites like age, experience, medical clearance, etc.

equivalent_to.description: List of certifications from other agencies considered equivalent. If a value starts with 'cert-', it's treated as a reference to another certification ID in the dataset. If a value starts with 'agency-', it's treated as a reference to an agency ID. Otherwise, values are used as literal certification names.

limits.description: Free-form statements describing the limits of this certification (e.g., 'Max 40m', '1 deco tank', 'No overhead environment').

links.description: List of URLs to official or reference sources for this certification.

region.description: Optional geographic or organizational region (if agency-specific).

updated_at.description: Timestamp when this certification entry was last updated.
